title: 服务器报错
author: z234696818
txt_content:
> [04:03:07 WARN]: java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_CORRUPT] The database disk image is malformed (database disk image is malformed)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.DB.throwex(DB.java:374)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.NativeDB.prepare(Native Method)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.DB.prepare(DB.java:123)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.<init>(PrepStmt.java:42)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:404)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:399)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:383)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:205)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:236)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:52)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:48)
> [04:03:07 WARN]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
服务器刷屏报错，求大佬解决
疯狂刷屏上面内容

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
删除 plugins/coreprotect 

数据损坏了

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 DreamVoid 于 2020-3-19 12:12 编辑 

\plugins\CoreProtect\config.yml
找到这个文件
修改文件内容：
use-mysql: false复制代码改成
use-mysql: true复制代码
并且配置一下Mysql
出现这个报错多半是你服务器的硬盘空间不足，清理硬盘空间或者按照上面的解决方法配置本地或远程数据库
